org.eclipse.jgit.hooks

クラス CommitMsgHook

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jgit.hooks.CommitMsgHook
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    Callable<String>

    public class CommitMsgHook
extends Object
    The commit-msg hook implementation. This hook is run before the commit and can reject the commit. It passes one argument to the hook script, which is the path to the COMMIT_MSG file, relative to the repository workTree.
    導入されたバージョン:
    4.0

    • フィールドのサマリー

      フィールド 
      修飾子とタイプ フィールドと説明
      static String NAME
      Constant indicating the name of the commit-smg hook.
      protected PrintStream outputStream
      The output stream to be used by the hook.

    • コンストラクタのサマリー

      修飾子 コンストラクタと説明
      protected CommitMsgHook(Repository repo, PrintStream outputStream) 

    • メソッドのサマリー

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      String call()
      Run the hook.
      protected void doRun()
      Runs the hook, without performing any validity checks.
      String getHookName() 
      protected PrintStream getOutputStream()

      This hook receives one parameter, which is the path to the file holding the current commit-msg, relative to the repository's work tree.

      protected String getStdinArgs()

    • フィールドの詳細

      • NAME

        public static final String NAME
        Constant indicating the name of the commit-smg hook.
        関連項目:
        定数フィールド値

      • outputStream

        protected final PrintStream outputStream
        The output stream to be used by the hook.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • CommitMsgHook

        protected CommitMsgHook(Repository repo,
                        PrintStream outputStream)
        パラメータ:
        repo - The repository
        outputStream - The output stream the hook must use. null is allowed, in which case the hook will use System.out.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • call

        public String call()
            throws IOException,
                   AbortedByHookException
        Run the hook.
        定義:
        call インタフェース内 Callable<String>
        例外:
        IOException - if IO goes wrong.
        AbortedByHookException - If the hook has been run and a returned an exit code different from zero.

      • getHookName

        public String getHookName()
        戻り値:
        The name of the hook, which must not be null.

      • getParameters

        protected String[] getParameters()
        This hook receives one parameter, which is the path to the file holding the current commit-msg, relative to the repository's work tree.
        戻り値:
        The parameters the hook receives.

      • setCommitMessage

        public CommitMsgHook setCommitMessage(String commitMessage)
        It is mandatory to call this method with a non-null value before actually calling the hook.
        パラメータ:
        commitMessage - The commit message before the hook has run.
        戻り値:
        this for convenience.

      • getRepository

        protected Repository getRepository()
        戻り値:
        The repository.

      • getStdinArgs

        protected String getStdinArgs()
        Override to provide relevant arguments via stdin to the underlying hook script. The default implementation returns null.
        戻り値:
        The parameters the hook receives.

      • getOutputStream

        protected PrintStream getOutputStream()
        戻り値:
        The output stream the hook must use. Never null, System.out is returned by default.

      • doRun

        protected void doRun()
              throws AbortedByHookException
        Runs the hook, without performing any validity checks.
        例外:
        AbortedByHookException - If the underlying hook script exited with non-zero.
